Content wrapper. The purpose of this component is to hold content inside of it. The specific sizes should be defined later.

Usage:


                <xui-content size="large">
                    Any text or valid html code.
                </xui-content>
Attributes:
size Size of the container. Values: 'large', 'normal' (default), 'small'.

Code Samples

{{vm.dynamicContent}}
